Headline: Founder, Build.tv | Building Media-led Distribution On YouTube
milliGOLD | RSR Innovations
Comment:
I think "scalable and moat" actually means will you become the dominant top 2 player in that category. Will you have pricing power - not because customers love your brand like apple or nike, but because they don't have a choice.

You can build a branded  profitable sustainable lemonade stand with millions of outlets across the world, that rewards local entreprenuers, farmers and loved by customers. You just have to be clear why you are building and for whom you are building.

Headline: Associate @ GLG | Ashoka University
Comment: Have you encountered any businesses you strongly believed weren't scalable that succeeded? Would love a post on businesses that defied the odds
